actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fanatic makes two Sacrificial Dagger or Unholy Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Sacrificial Dagger
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage or necrotic damage (the fanatic's choice). If the target is paralyzed, prone, stunned, or unconscious, it takes an extra 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Unholy Bolt
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) fire damage or necrotic damage (the fanatic's choice).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The fanatic casts one of the following spells, using WIS as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13).
At will: _light_, _thaumaturgy_
3/day each: _bane_, _command_
2/day: _hold_

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: The fanatic is resistant to the charmed and frightened conditions.

special_abilities.name: Unholy Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The fanatic's weapons are coated in dark, magical flames. When the fanatic hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 fire damage or necrotic damage (included in the attack), the fanatic's choice.
